title: Perhapanauts Volume 1: Triangle
description: Bigfoot, ghosts, mothman, and the chupacabras -- strange and mysterious creatures from folklore and local legend, cryptids that stay just out of sight of the American public. There is a covert organization designed to track down and contain these bizarre creatures. It's agents are The Perhapanauts, and they just happen to be...a bigfoot, a mothman, a ghost, a chupacabra!
author: Craig Rousseau
